title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Ticketmaster: Enhancing live event experiences for fans with AWS (SPF206)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Ticketmaster：利用AWS提升粉丝现场活动体验 (SPF206)
abstract: Discover how Ticketmaster, the world's largest ticket marketplace, delivers superior live event experiences by bringing its online ticket sales and distribution platform closer to fans with AWS Local Zones. Learn how Ticketmaster overcame technical challenges by reducing latency while using AWS native compute, storage, and other services. We'll examine the architectural evolution, critical decisions, and the transformative impact of onboarding latency-sensitive applications to Local Zones. This session provides insights into how Ticketmaster's implementation sets new standards for distributed cloud, balancing innovation and improving end-user experience.
abstract_cn: 了解全球最大的票务市场Ticketmaster如何通过AWS Local Zones将其在线票务销售和分发平台更贴近粉丝，从而提供卓越的现场活动体验。了解Ticketmaster如何通过降低延迟同时使用AWS原生计算、存储和其他服务来克服技术挑战。我们将探讨架构演进、关键决策以及将延迟敏感型应用程序部署到Local Zones所带来的变革性影响。本次会议将深入介绍Ticketmaster的实施如何为分布式云树立新标准，在创新与改善最终用户体验之间取得平衡。
